SELECT mng.id, station.station_id AS stationId, station.station_type AS stationType, model.id AS modelId, model.report_name AS reportName, model.model_file_url AS modelFileUrl, model.model_version AS modelVersion FROM jb_station_model_rel rel INNER JOIN jb_report_model model ON rel.model_id = model.id and model.status=1 INNER JOIN jb_station station ON rel.station_id = station.station_id AND station.is_show = 1 INNER JOIN jb_report_mng mng ON mng.station_id = rel.station_id
AND mng.report_status = #{reportStatus}
